title: Implement Stratum
body: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1571
This should come with a mini mock-miner console app written in python or C# that will pretend to be on the other side and that will be used in a series of integration tests for various scenarios.

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 8.0 ETH (2086.72 USD @ $260.84/ETH) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/NethermindEth/nethermind/1483/4051). * Want to chip in? Please review their action plans below:


**1) [davidbanu](https://gitcoin.co/davidbanu) has started work.**

Would love to work on this. I have plenty of experience with Solidity and could also develop the mini mock-miner console app in python.

Learn more [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/NethermindEth/nethermind/1483/4051).
Hi @davidbanu, would you like to discuss the plan of work? Can talk on Gitter or arrange a Zoom call.

work on this bounty and do some research. i build the tasks here:

- [ ] let  nethermind support  stratum param and can correctly connect to miner pool.
- [ ]  add  some series of integration tests for various scenarios

target nicehash pool as testing pool
`echo -ne "{\"id\":1, \"method\":\"mining.subscribe\", \"params\":[\"NiceHash\/1.0.0\",\"EthereumStratum/1.0.0\"]}\n" | while IFS= read -r line; do echo $line; sleep .5; done | nc sha256.hk.nicehash.com 3334
`

@tkstanczak hi , please reference the issue: AndreaLanfranchi/EthereumStratum-2.0.0#10 i suggest postpone the issue, we can switch to Stratum v1 from hashrate pool or ethproxy protocol by f2pool pool. are you some advice for me.
@tkstanczak any feedback on it.
https://github.com/sammy007/open-ethereum-pool

@xiaods the goal is to have the existing pools / miners that currently use Geth / Parity to be able to switch to Nethermind if they want without any additional integration

if Startum V2 is not used then we do not need it and let us implement what is used
@tkstanczak got it. let me start the jobs.
@xiaods thanks and sorry for late response, only now coming back to full coding mode after days of conferences and catching up with many things, shout out if any questions

update: I will continue to work on this issue. let u you. for your statement, I know currently we should support nicehash pool's stratum protocol v1(nicehash proposal this protocol).
todo list:

1、analysis current node miner method, 
2、add stratum protocol to node
3、add stratum simulate to test tools.

follow nethermind docs:

eth_getWork() [NOT IMPLEMENTED]
eth_submitWork(nonce, headerPowHash, mixDigest) [NOT IMPLEMENTED]

> follow nethermind docs:
> 
> eth_getWork() [NOT IMPLEMENTED]
> eth_submitWork(nonce, headerPowHash, mixDigest) [NOT IMPLEMENTED]

Do you need any support here?
@tkstanczak I just share some information here,  let another guy can interest this can joining the development cycle.
hi @xiaods, how is it going, do you need any support / jump on a call?
@tkstanczak,  I am working on implement submit,getwork function in EthModule.cs.  I have not yet finish it.
Hi. Am seeing this as expired on Gitcoin, but still open here. Are you still interested in having someone work on this for the bounty? Implementing stratum looks really interesting to me.
@tkstanczak
@xiaods have you dropped it?
@kuberlog definitely need someone on it, not expired, if not implemented by anybody then we will have to pick it soon, it is high priority for us
@tkstanczak Ok. I think I can get it done by Wed, April 29th.

please let me know at your convenience (but sooner, the better)
@tkstanczak go ahead and start it internally
ok, thanks @kuberlog, we have it scheduled now
